main event: A civilian observed an oval-shaped object the size of a B-29 flying silently over Shreveport, Louisiana on December 7, 1957.
interesting points: The object was silver and surrounded by vapor., There was no exhaust or sound produced by the object., The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes., The observer reported a cigar-shaped rocket object on the same day., There was insufficient data for a definitive conclusion regarding the object.
